channel.title: Can't win as inq in 2.5.0b
channel.description:
#### What happened? I played inq and had all my targets dead: 2 physicians and drunk. 1 of phys died as Assasin cause he was converted. After last target died I had message that I won and could leave the game (but I decided to stay in game). After that I was executed by court, After the game ended it said that I actually lost...
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen? Game was supposed to tell me that I had won and not lost after game ended.
#### Steps to reproduce:
#### Comments: Unfortunately, I didn't make screenshots right after the game cause I didn't expect this to happen. In old patches this had never happened to me.

item.title: Can't win as inq in 2.5.0b
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Just wanted to note that I’ve seen Inquisitors win this patch in my own games. So whatever problem happened here is not consistent.

Read full topic

item.title: Can't win as inq in 2.5.0b
item.dc:creator: beo
item.description:
What happened?

I played inq and had all my targets dead: 2 physicians and drunk. 1 of phys died as Assasin cause he was converted. After last target died I had message that I won and could leave the game (but I decided to stay in game). After that I was executed by court, After the game ended it said that I actually lost…

What was SUPPOSED to happen?

Game was supposed to tell me that I had won and not lost after game ended.

Steps to reproduce:

Comments:

Unfortunately, I didn’t make screenshots right after the game cause I didn’t expect this to happen. In old patches this had never happened to me.

Read full topic
